img_text: roko but spookyToday at 1105 PM @everyone This may be a little out of left field, but I've created a patreon in order to help with expenses, as well as making it so it doesn't look like I'm begging for money when I beg for money. Donating will give access to a special donors role, and will have more to it in the future. I love you all. https://www.patreon.com/Kobayashiden Patreon gon den is creating a fun discord community Become a patron of Kobayashi-san's dragon den today: Read posts by Kobayashi-san's dragon den and get access to exclusive content and experiences on the world's largest membership platform for artists and creators. 小林iron メイドラゴン
